forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. West northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 43, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West northwest wind 1 to 5 mph.
